message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which I believe would greatly benefit you. Given its high value and quality, I think it's worth more than what others are willing to pay. Considering its true worth and the benefits it offers, I am extending this exclusive offer to you for $120. This price not only reflects the product's value but also allows us to maintain a fair transaction. I hope you find this offer appealing and look forward to your positive response.
